content: you will need a large-eyed sewing needle for finishing you will also need a cable needle wool and the gang suggest using circular needles and knitting back and forth on the main pieces and edgings finished measurements chest circumference 33 4 36 2 40 2 44 4 85 92 102 113 cm finished length 19 3 19 5 19 9 20 7 49 49 5 50 5 52 5 cm yarn used wool and the gang shiny happy cotton a 1 ball for all sizes b 5 5 6 7 balls
